text: Good morning sunshine. You know right you are my sunshine. You always bring so much brightness to my life that I can't help but smile. Always be there for me babu. I really need you. I just want you now in my arms, wanna kiss you and hug you so much. Jaldi se aajao na babu. Ache se rehena, dusaro se jada phehle apna khayal rakna, you are very percious to me babu. Jaldi aakar tumse khoob saari baate karni hai. 🌞

Lunch?. Jada tension maat lo sab thik se hojaega, sadhguru hai na, wo sab thik se karwa denge. tum bas apna khayal rako and apne kam pe dhiyan do bas thik hai. Really miss that i am not there with you. When i will come i wont leave you a single second. Jaldi aata hu babu 🍱
Good night sona. Sojana aaj jaldi, mujhe bahut bhuk lagi hai maan kar raha tumhe pura kha jau. Aajao na mere pas, tumhe har jaga kiss and bite karna hai. I really need you by my side sona.  🌙
